title: Canada Type
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000218/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000218/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Canada Type**

Canada Type is a digital type solutions company based in [Toronto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000218/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Toronto), [Canada](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000218/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Canada), operating under the direction of [Patrick Griffin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000218/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Patrick%20Griffin) and [Rebecca Alaccari](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000218/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rebecca%20Alaccari).

URL: [canadatype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000218/http:/www.canadatype.com/)
author: Ken Messenger
